why_choose: Why choose this course? IBEC certification for select students Content and pedagogical expertise Immersive internships – observation and teaching Emphasis on holistic development Multifaceted workshops and seminars Community & Service-Learning opportunities
what_learn: What you will learn? Subject-specific knowledge ensuring expertise in academic domains, and pedagogical knowledge for fostering impactful education. Understand educational psychology to gain insights into children's development and learning processes. Educational technology for meeting the evolving needs and demands of 21st century education. Gain insights on curriculum design and assessment practices for effective educational planning and student evaluation. Explore the evolving educational landscape, addressing contemporary matters like multicultural and inclusive education. Acquire knowledge on educational organizational culture, leadership styles, and resource management aspects.
modules: Modules Introduction to Education Curriculum development and assessment practices Philosophical Foundations of Education Semester 1 Educational Psychology Pedagogy of School Subject Skill enhancement and Holistic development IBDP Core elements Introduction to Educational Research Gender Sensitization and Inclusive Education Semester 2 Pedagogy of School Subject School Internship – Phase 1 Skill enhancement and Holistic development Service Learning and Community Engagement Semester 3 School Internship – Phase 2 Sociological Perspectives in Education Contemporary Educational Issues Guidance and Counselling Semester 4 Leadership practices in Education Subject-specific Electives Research Project
career: Career prospects Empower young minds through classroom instruction, guiding their educational journeys with care and expertise. Contribute to the development of educational content, foster meaningful learning experiences, and shape the future of learning. Lead and transform education with careers in educational administration, enhancing the capacities of schools and institutions. Pathways to develop future educators, promoting professional development, and elevating educational standards. Engage with governmental and non-governmental institutions to promote educational initiatives, ensuring positive societal change. Drive innovation in education technology, creating solutions that transform and elevate the learning experience.
